question: What should you do if your espresso shots are pulling too short?

answerChoices.choice1: Tamp harder so that the grinds are more compact.
answerChoices.choice2: Adjust the grinder to make the coffee grinds coarser.
answerChoices.choice3: If you don't have much time, pull the dosing lever three times instead of two to add in a little more goffee grinds.
answerChoices.choice4: Adjust the grinder to make the coffee grinds finer.

question: What should you do if your espresso shots are pulling too long?

answerChoices.choice1: Tamp harder so that the grinds are more compact.
answerChoices.choice2: Adjust the grinder to make the coffee grinds coarser.
answerChoices.choice3: If you don't have much time, pull the dosing lever three times instead of two to add in a little more goffee grinds.
answerChoices.choice4: Adjust the grinder to make the coffee grinds finer.
